title: Bye Bye Bye

description.plain:
“Bye Bye Bye” is the introductory song of ‘N Sync’s album No Strings Attached. It is arguably the quintet’s most popular song, and also arguably has the most overt messages: they’re breaking up with a girl for being a pain in the butt.

Their classic music video exemplifies how this girl continues to play with their emotions.

embed_content: Read “Bye Bye Bye” by *NSYNC on Genius
recording_location: Cheiron Studios (Stockholm, Sweden), Battery Studios (New York City, NY), Cove City Sound Studios (Orlando, FL)

body.plain:

Their classic music video exemplifies how this girl continues to play with their emotions.

lyrics:
92 ContributorsTranslationsDeutschEspañolsrpskiРусский (Russian)TürkçeBye Bye Bye Lyrics“Bye Bye Bye” is the introductory song of ‘N Sync’s album No Strings Attached. It is arguably the quintet’s most popular song, and also arguably has the most overt messages: they’re breaking up with a girl… Read More 
Hey, hey
Bye, bye, bye
(Bye, bye)
(Bye, bye)
(Oh, oh)

(I) I'm doin' this tonight
(You're) Probably gonna start a fight
(I) Know this can't be right
Hey, baby, come on
(I) Loved you endlessly
(And) You weren't there for me
(So) Now, it's time to leave
And make it alone

I know that I can't take no more
It ain't no lie
I wanna see you out that door
Baby, bye, bye, bye (Bye, bye)

Don't wanna be a fool for you
Just another player in your game for two
You may hate me, but it ain't no lie
Baby, bye, bye, bye (Bye, bye)
Don't really wanna make it tough
I just wanna tell you that I've had enough
Might sound crazy, but it ain't no lie
Baby, bye, bye, bye (Oh, oh)

(You) Just hit me with the truth
(Now) Girl, you're more than welcome to
(So) Give me one good reason
Baby, come on
(I've) Lived for you and me
(And) Now, I really come to see
(That) Life would be much better
Once you're gone

I know that I can't take no more
It ain't no lie
I wanna see you out that door
Baby, bye, bye, bye (Bye, bye)

Don't wanna be a fool for you
Just another player in your game for two
You may hate me, but it ain't no lie
Baby, bye, bye, bye (Bye, bye)
Don't really wanna make it tough
I just wanna tell you that I've had enough (Ooh, ooh)
Might sound crazy, but it ain't no lie
Baby, bye, bye, bye

I'm givin' up, I know for sure
I don't wanna be the reason for your love no more
(Bye, bye)
I'm checkin' out, I'm signin' off
I don't wanna be the loser and I've had enough
I don't wanna be your fool
In this game for two
So I'm leavin' you behind (Bye, bye, bye, yeah)
I don't wanna make it tough (Make it tough)
But I've had enough (Bye, bye)
And it ain't no lie
Bye, bye (Baby)

Don't wanna be a fool for you (I don't wanna be a fool)
Just another player in your game for two (In this game for two)
I don't wanna be a fool, but it ain't no lie
Baby, bye, bye, bye (Bye, bye)
Don't really wanna make it tough (Oh) (I don't wanna make it tough)
I just wanna tell you that I've had enough (But I had enough)
Might sound crazy, but it ain't no lie
Bye, bye, bye (Bye, bye)
